title: Indian onion bhaji curry
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons oil', '1 teaspoon grated ginger', '2-3 garlic cloves, crushed or minced', '350g passata or 1 (400g) tin of chopped tomatoes, drained', '¼ teaspoon ground turmeric', '½ teaspoon chilli powder', '1½ teaspoons ground cumin', '1¼ teaspoon ground coriander', '1½ tablespoons garam masala', '250ml whipping cream', 'freshly chopped coriander leaves, for garnish', 'Onion Bhajis', '125g besan (chickpea flour)', '¼ teaspoon ground turmeric', '½ teaspoon chilli powder', '½ teaspoon asafoetida', '1 thinly sliced onion', 'oil, for deep frying']
